jobDescription: Position Overview: Speck's Market Analyst Intern will support the Product Management team including research and analysis of market and product trends, gathering insights for new product briefs, and developing analytical dashboards and reports. The opportunity may evolve beyond what's listed below so we are looking for someone who can adapt to new responsibilities quickly with a can-do, jump-right-in attitude.  This is a 3 to 6 month full-time paid internship opportunity. Recent graduates and final year students are encouraged to apply assuming you can work a minimum of 40 hours per week.
